data.instruction: Extract PII entities from the paragraph given

examples.input: I withdrew $100 from the bank in New York from my phone (345) 123-7867 and email raj@gmail.com. Regards, Raj
examples.output:
1. $100: money,
2. New York: location,
3. (345) 123-7867: PhoneNumber,
4. Raj: Person,
5. raj@gmail.com: Email
